precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Theme:" dropdown menu displays "Windows Classic (Modified)" as the selected theme.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Theme:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available themes will appear in the dropdown menu.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the 'Screen Saver' selection box. Then, click on 'None' in the list of available screen savers.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will show 'None' selected. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power...' button is visible in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, overlaying the 'Display Properties' window.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of time intervals will appear, allowing you to choose when the monitor should turn off.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor:' dropdown menu will close. The 'Never' option will be displayed, indicating the monitor will not automatically turn off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu set to "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will remain open.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.
